content.query:
CREATE VIEW gso.dim_sales_force
AS

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://gsksynapseaccount.dfs.core.windows.net/gsksynapsestorage/synapse/workspaces/gsk-synapse/warehouse/dash.gso/dim_sales_force.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) WITH( USER_ID                         VARCHAR(250) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            SF_SOURCE_USER_AID              VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            [USER_NAME]                       VARCHAR(250) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            FIRST_NAME                      VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            [NAME]                           VARCHAR(250) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            LAST_NAME                       VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            COUNTRY                         CHAR(2) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            STATE_PROVINCE                  CHAR(2) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            CITY                            VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            POSTAL_CODE                     VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            ACTIVE_IND                      VARCHAR(250) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            EMAIL                           VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            EMPLOYEE_NUMBER_AID           VARCHAR(250) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8 ,
            USER_IDENTIFIER_AID             VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            CORE_GSK_FUNCTIONAL_PROFILE     VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            PROFILE_NAME                    VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            CICLO                           VARCHAR(250) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8 ,
            SALES_FORCE_KEY                 VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            ROW_ID_TERRITORIO               VARCHAR(250) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            ROW_ID_GD                       VARCHAR(250) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            NOME_GD                         VARCHAR(250) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            NOME_GR                         VARCHAR(250) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            TERRITORIO_GD                   VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            TERRITORIO_GR                   VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            BU                              VARCHAR(250) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            DIVISAO                         VARCHAR(250) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            TERRITORIO                      VARCHAR(250) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            NOME_REP                        VARCHAR(250) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            AREA                            VARCHAR(MAX) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            UF                              CHAR(2) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            REGION                          VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            [STATE]                           VARCHAR(250) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8 
            
        ) AS ROW
